question: Who is to be inducted into WWE Hall of Fame?
explanation: Former professional wrestler-actor Dave Bautista will be inducted into the WWE Hall of Fame. The ceremony will be held at Amalie Arena in Tampa Bay, Florida, as part of WrestleMania week on April 2, 2020. The Guardians of the Galaxy series star is a six-time WWE World Champion and has founded the faction Evolution, alongside iconic performers Ric Flair, Triple H, and Randy Orton. Mr. Bautista, who transitioned to full-time Hollywood, said receiving the news of the honour from Vince McMahon, CEO of WWE, was a “great feeling”.
